articles.title: Antarctica's Doomsday Glacier melting rate increases, risks global sea level rise - India Today NE
articles.description: Antarctica's Doomsday Glacier, the world's widest glacier, has lost over 50 billion tons of ice due to global warming. The accelerating melting rate could potentially cause a significant rise in global sea levels.
articles.content:
Antarctica's Doomsday Glacier, the world's widest glacier, has lost over 50 billion tons of ice and the melting rate is on the rise as the continent gets warmer.
